name: Lab Fruit
description:
Lab Fruit

Survive the Overgrown Fruits and defeat the boss. Chop down trees, smash rocks, and protect yourself as best you can.

Only you can save yourself

Controls :

Up - W

Down - S

Right - A

Left - D

Sprint - L_Shift

Shoot - Space or Left_Click

Pickaxe - 0

Pistol - 1

Shotgun - 2

Wood - Q

Stone - C

Seed - E

Lab Fruit by Zukun Games
